snippet: A day after the president’s address, Speaker John A. Boehner invited Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to address a joint meeting of Congress next month for what would effectively be a rebuttal.
abstract: House Speaker John A Boehner invites Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu to address joint session of Congress in February, constituting rebuttal to Pres Obama's State of the Union address; move stuns Obama administration, in sign Republicans plan to challenge Obama on international policy, as well as domestic affairs.
lead_paragraph: A day after the president’s address, Speaker John A. Boehner invited Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to address a joint meeting of Congress next month for what would effectively be a rebuttal.

headline.main: Boehner Invites Another Response to State of Union, From Israel’s Premier
headline.print_headline: Boehner Invites Another Response to State of Union, From Israel’s Premier
